dct_description_sm: Covers coastal western and central Africa from Sierra Leone to Gabon; shows equator.
Latitudinal and longitudinal lines along margins.
Decorative cartouches (with indigenous figures, sirens, mermaids), compass rose, rhumb lines, ships.
Appears in Ogilby's An accurate description and complete history of Africa, 1670.
dct_publisher_sm: printed by T. Johnson for the author
